### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a lab (position x=0.5, y=0.5) connected to power network with ElectricityGroup(id=3647)

### Inserter and Chest system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) and a chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Inserter and Chest system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of a burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) and a chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
-  Make sure the inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
### Errors when trying to get an entity that does not exist at the specified position
-  Ensure the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it
### Errors when setting research in a lab without power
-  Ensure the lab has power before attempting to set research
### Errors when trying to refuel an entity without sufficient fuel
-  Ensure there is sufficient fuel before attempting to refuel an entity
### Errors when trying to connect a lab to a power network with zero voltage
-  Ensure the power network has a non-zero voltage before attempting to connect a lab to it
